meanings.definition: The act of publicly accusing someone or something of wrongdoing.
meanings.sent1: The denouncement of the thief shocked the entire town.
meanings.sent2: The denouncement of the cheating scandal was broadcast on the news.
meanings.sent3: During the denouncement at the party, everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her denouncement of the bad weather was met with skepticism.
meanings.sent5: The denouncement of the crime scene was hauntingly detailed.

meanings.sent1: The denouncement of the winner was met with cheers and applause.
meanings.sent2: The denouncement of the new policy was posted on the bulletin board.
meanings.sent3: The denouncement of the surprise party spread quickly among friends.
meanings.sent4: His denouncement of love for her was written in the stars.
meanings.sent5: The denouncement of the ceasefire brought hope for peace.
